name: WKInterfaceLabel
desc: An interface element that displays static text.

items.name: func setText(String?)
items.desc: Sets the label text to the specified string.

items.name: func setTextColor(UIColor?)
items.desc: Sets the color to apply to plain text strings.

items.name: func setAttributedText(NSAttributedString?)
items.desc: Sets the label text to the specified attributed string.
